duties_responsibilities.duty: Be the corporate expert on Combustion Safety for Arconic, develop and deploy Thermal Best Practice, and solve problems with global systemic and plant-specific focus.

Drive resolution of chronic problems within area of expertise, lead problem-solving teams, develop and deploy standard practices, and maintain a working relationship with vendors of thermal and combustion equipment.

Provide engineering and operational support for large capital improvement projects, sponsor, participate, and occasionally lead development projects, and participate in technical assessments of facilities and individual pieces of equipment.
Provide equipment, control, and process training to the technical base, and support major customers at Global GRPE locations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
